content.text:
# 3rd Annual BFJA Awards

The 3rd Annual Bengal Film Journalists' Association Awards were
held on 1940, honoring the best in India cinema in 1939.
Best India Film
Aadmi
Best Bengali Film
Jibon Maran
Best Hindi Film
Aadmi
Best Foreign Film
- Pygmalion
References
